sense.gloss: to persevere, to persist, to keep at it, to hang on, to hold out, to do one's best
to insist that, to stick to (one's opinion)
to remain in a place, to stick to one's post, to refuse to budge
hang in there, go for it, keep at it, do your best
solid, firm, stout, burly, strong, sturdy
stubbornly, firmly, determinedly, obstinately, resolutely, adamantly
robust, fit and healthy, strong, sturdy

sdata.j: あなたは↑本当↑↓ほんとう↓に↑頑張↑↓がんば↓り↑屋↑↓や↓さんだ。
↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑主張↑↓しゅちょう↓は、ぼくの↑頑固↑↓がんこ↓↑親父↑↓おやじ↓のと↑同↑↓おな↓じく↑納得↑↓なっとく↓できない。
sdata.e: Your argument is not any more convincing than that of my stubborn father.

sdata.j: ↑救助↑↓きゅうじょ↓↑隊↑↓たい↓がくるまで↑頑張↑↓がんば↓りなさい。
sdata.e: Try to hold on until a rescue team arrives.

sdata.j: ↑気合↑↓きあ↓いを↑入↑↓い↓れて↑頑張↑↓がんば↓れ。
sdata.e: Roll up your sleeves and get busy.

sdata.j: ↑頑張↑↓がんば↓れよ、そうすればできるから。
sdata.e: Hang in there. You can do it!

sdata.j: ↑頑張↑↓がんば↓るのよ↑省吾↑↓しょうご↓、あなたなら↑出来↑↓でき↓るわ。
sdata.e: Come on, Shougo. You can do it.

sdata.j: ↑頑固↑↓がんこ↓↑一↑↓いち↓↑徹↑↓てっ↓のボスだと↑思↑↓おも↓っていたけれど、↑結構↑↓けっこう↓かわいいところもあるじゃない。
sdata.e: I thought our boss was stubborn as a mule but actually he has his cute side.

sdata.j: ↑頑固↑↓がんこ↓になればなるほど↑独立↑↓どくりつ↓するよ。
sdata.e: The more stubborn you are, the more isolated you become.

sdata.j: ↑頑固↑↓がんこ↓になればなるほど↑孤立↑↓こりつ↓するよ。
sdata.e: If it becomes stubborn indeed it stands alone.

words.gloss: to persevere, to persist, to keep at it, to hang on, to hold out, to do one's best
hang in there, go for it, keep at it, do your best
